channel.title: Yumi on Tips
channel.description: Recent content in Yumi on Tips

item.title: YumiMediationSDK
item.description: [TOC] YumiMediationAds API & Delegate & Report YumiMediationSDKBanner API /// The view that displays banner ads. interface YumiMediationBannerView : UIView /// Required to set this banner view to a proper size. Use one of the predefined standard ad sizes (such as kYumiMediationAdViewBanner320x50) If you want to specify the ad size you need to set it before calling loadAd: /// default: iPhone and iPod Touch ad size. Typically 320x50. /// default: iPad ad size.
